price: ߒ߬ߓߎ߫ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲ ߖߌ ߘߊ߲߬ߠߊߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߣߍ߲ ( ߝߐ߬ߝߐ ߓߟߏ߫ )߸ ߊ߲ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߕߊ߬ ߞߎߟߎ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
